               double angle)

        Creates a ship using the given properties.
        Specified by:
        createShip in interface IFacade
        Parameters:
        x - The x component of the ship's position vector.
        y - The y component of the ship's position vector.
        xVelocity - The x component of the ship's velocity vector.
        yVelocity - The y component of the ship's velocity vector.
        radius - The ship's radius.
        angle - The ship's angle.
        Returns:
        A new ship with the given values.
            result == new Ship(...)
        Throws:
        ModelException - [CAN] When invalid properties are provided for the ship.

      • overlap

        public boolean overlap(IShip ship1,
              IShip ship2)
                throws ModelException
        Checks if two ships overlap.
        Specified by:
        overlap in interface IFacade
        Parameters:
        ship1 - The first ship.
        ship2 - The second ship.
        Returns:
        Whether the ships overlap or not.
            result == getDistanceBetween(ship1, ship2) - getRadius(ship1) - getRadius(ship2) <= 0
        Throws:
        ModelException - [CAN] One of the given ships is null
            ((ship1 == null) || (ship2 == null))
